comments.body:
Hi! Thank you so much for explaining the problems you've experienced in such a detailed nuanced way. It really helped us understand how to fix it. We're woking on it!
/Unn
THANK YOU FOR COMMENTING THIS. Iâ€™ve been a minecraft PE player for years and love the game but this new dpad update has made it infuriating to play at all.
I also think it would be a good idea that you can use this one or the old one.

I honestly think it would be better if they would keep both, but with how they changed the d-pad, they could give the customization some more flexibility. I donâ€™t know if Mojang is going to read this but if they do, I hope they could come to a middle point of bringing back the classic d-pad but also keeping the d-pad they are using now for the players who might be more comfortable with the way it is. Personally I hope they bring back the classic d-pad controls, Iâ€™ve always used them and Iâ€™m having a hard time playing with the new ones.
PLEASE, i struggle to play with the new ones at all

I agree with the other person. The new look and mobility about the mobile controls is bad for me. I do not understand why Minecraft changed it but I do not like it. I would recommend doing somthing like you did in the 1.17 update I think when the textures all changed and add an old texture pack for the controls. Thank you

Yes they need to add more customisation to it. I hate that now the fly up button has been moved from the middle of the dpad to the right side of the screen. You wouldnâ€™t change a button on a controller or a key on a keyboard with no way to change it back, so why do the same for mobile? I like the new stuff in Minecraft but controlls is one thing that should not be changed without having the option to go back. You can ignore new updates in the game if you donâ€™t like them but you canâ€™t ignore changes tp the controlls themselves.
Oooo
Tienen razÃ³n a mÃ­ es muy molestoso cuando estoy jugando pvp y tengo que sacar algo rÃ¡pido del inventario, y solo hay una alternativa pero es alternativa no me gusta asÃ­ que por favor aÃ±Ã¡danlo
It'd be great if they had left the control schemes alone, it's been the same since I started playing MCPE in 2014, and it's worked for almost a decade, why change it now?
I need d-pad ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­

Agreed; this would be great for builders too, as continuous placement would be much easier if you could move consistently in a cardinal direction without having to put your full focus into keeping your finger steady

I have stopped playing and I already miss Minecraft. Itâ€™s not enjoyable anymore because of this. And with how many issues people are having, I wonder if mojang actually tested this and got real feedback or if one team came up with an idea and updated it without consulting anyone else
True. This was a terrible change, i can't just get used to this, i loved the old one it was so much comfortable and literally better. Mojang is making some dumb moves right now. :/
AGREE, I also do pvp and this is terrible, I hope mojang can see this
Completely agree. I won't be playing again until they are back to the normal look and position, I just get too frustrated trying to move now.
Completely agree it sucks
I think the biggest problem is the margins of the new buttons make it so that you can't slide your finger to different directions, doing so makes you stop moving.
Yeah the new UI is incredibly difficult and frustrating to use and makes the game less enjoyable to play.
Old controls was Perfect why did they change It
Pretty sure that when fighting other players, the circle stops you from chaining combos from a distance.
I HATE THE NEW D PAD
This is bullcrap
My autistic daughter canâ€™t even play anymore. She hates the new change! Bring back the old D Pad!

This is not so easy anymore! ðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ¤¬ðŸ¤¬ðŸ¤¬ðŸ¤¬ðŸ¤¬ðŸ¤¬ðŸ¤¬ðŸ¤¬ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­

This D-pad change is the worst!!!!! This is so fake!!

I am so angry right now!!! Break it right now!!!!
Old D-Pads are the best! Please change it back how it was!
New D-pads will be banned from the game!!! Old D-Pads are the best and forever will it be!
I am so sad right now.
What is a D-pad?
Please make it an option!!
I've been having these exact, frustrating, problems! Also, when I'm trying to swim up water, right when I pop up, the swim button splits and stops my swimming! Please add this option!

Yes! These are major issues that are holding me back. I always want to play the game so bad but the new spacing and just all around glitches of it just make me lose all motivation. I would really love to see the option of the older version. I dont think they needed to change it as it had already worked well.
BRING BACK THE OLD ONES THHE NEW ONES FOR 1.21 SUCK
i am convinced they did no playthroughs and tests prior to changing it. the actual worst update the game has ever released
I agree

Thanks for letting us know what you're experiencing! We're working on a fix. 
But I would love to know how the d-pad position isn't working for you. Can you share some more details?

Thanks in advance!
/Unn

The new d-pad is too high up compared to the old one. and we canâ€™t move it back to its original position. but the position isnâ€™t the worst part, itâ€™s the fact that the buttons work differently compared to the old ones. they donâ€™t work well at all, the old one was so much better. i understand if mojang wanted to make the buttons look like the other sets of controls but donâ€™t change the functionality or position of them.
Love to just be able to have the option to change back to the classic d pad.
Love to just be able to have the option to change back to the classic d pad.
It's so hard to move now
I'm using an iPad and the new touch controls in 1.2.71 have made them unusable, please add an option to revert to the old touch control interface design!
The touch controls in 1.20.71 have ruined Minecraft - please change the Dpad controls back!!! Or include an option to change back to the previous layout and controls.
I agree, there should be an option to use the new ones or the classic one
*slaps own face* if you delete the game and sign back in and create a world you can change your D-pad

You don't need to you can go to any world or server and you tap setting then you tap touch controls then you see a button that says change control mode when you click on it you can choose between 3 options including the D-pad with touch controls. You don't even have to delete the game and sign back in like a other user said.
You still cant change the spacing of each individual button though. It makes it for rickety controls that make the game unstable

To comments saying to go into the settings to change. This is the only d-pad available and there is no option for the old one. Resizing also doesn't help due to the shift out. It also doesn't fit the right side control change.
I want to go to bedrock edition
Iâ€™m having the same problem! Why get rid of the simple toggle that swapped the buttons in favor of having to do it yourself manually? I donâ€™t see why we canâ€™t have both as options.
I have same problem I always use left handed mode but now I can't find it. How am I supposed to play now?
Same problem here. Even if you adjust the controls manually you can only fly up, not down. This is not how you can build properly in Creative
The customised controls also revert back when swimming, when joining half the time and don't work most the time. Also the open inventory button
Plz ZZ I need voise chat to play with my friends
Please add
i completely agree iâ€™ve been playing on my ipad and now pvp is impossible CHANGE IT BACK

Thank you so much for sharing your thoughts in such a constructive way! <3 
We're working on improving the controls as we speak.

/Unn UX Designer at Mojang
Agreed, I am quitting until the old ones are brought back, or an option to switch to them is added.
I'm using an iPad and the new touch controls in 1.2.71 have made them unusable, please add an option to revert to the old touch control interface design!
The touch controls in 1.20.71 have ruined Minecraft - please change the Dpad controls back!!! Or include an option to change back to the previous layout and controls.

I agree with you
Nobody wanted the new D-Pad at all
Get rid of it it's to hard to use or just make the old touch controller a option
I'm wondering how it would look like in the UI though, but yes. You've earned a vote!

I think that it should be added only for phones and tablet, because I think it's easier with the same touch for computer or console !!!

I'm still gonna vote for it ; )
I don't see the point in this and we want to limit as many buttons as is needed.

Another thing that bothered me is that swimming is 10x harder for me with the new controls. I've tried sizing it differently in the settings but it doesn't help because it's so far out from where it was originally, and because the right side controls changed. This also affected flying in creative on mobile
I just looked at the new d-pad and I HATE it it's been so long since I used d-pad controls but now I miss them

Another problem is that to exit fly mode in creative you have to double tap DOWN, which not only is different from ALL other versions of the game, but also EVERY OTHER GAME WITH FLY MECHANICS, and so itâ€™s extremely confusing, annoying, and HORRIBLE.
No matter how bad the new d-pads are. For me, the old d-pad would still be the best.

The Problem is that it is not possible to place the new Dpad like the old one because the Hit box of the Dpad is in a square form and collides with the Hotbar. Please introduce an Option of using the Old Dpad.ðŸ™
Same!
